VEC.Q: How many lines are in this lines chart?

SRP.Q: In 1967, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Free Users relative to Mobile Users?
SRP.A: In 1967, Free Users is {above} Mobile Users in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Desktop Users, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1965 relative to that in 1961 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Desktop Users, the data point in 1965 is {above} and to the {right} of the data point in 1961.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of New Users's Average Watch Time levels?
VPR.A: New Users's average watch time levels show a {bimodal peak} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Free Users's Average Watch Time levels?
VPR.A: Free Users's average watch time levels show a {volatile rising} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Mobile Users's Average Watch Time levels?
VPR.A: Mobile Users's average watch time levels show a {stable falling} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Desktop Users's Average Watch Time levels?
VPR.A: Desktop Users's average watch time levels show a {exponential rising} trend.

VE.Q: What is Desktop Users's Average Watch Time in 1967?
VE.A: Desktop Users's average watch time in 1967 is {79.75} minutes.

VE.Q: What is New Users's Average Watch Time in 1961?
VE.A: New Users's average watch time in 1961 is {90.57} minutes.

VE.Q: What is Mobile Users's Average Watch Time in 1966?
VE.A: Mobile Users's average watch time in 1966 is {20.21} minutes.

VE.Q: What are the average watch time of New Users, Mobile Users, and Desktop Users in 1965?
VE.A: New Users's average watch time is {97.22} minutes, Mobile Users's average watch time is {19.79} minutes, Desktop Users's average watch time is {65.60} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Average Watch Time in the line chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum average watch time is {17.86} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Average Watch Time in the line chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum average watch time is {98.77} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Average Watch Time level recorded for Desktop Users?
EVJ.A: Desktop Users reached approximately {79.75} minutes in {1967}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Average Watch Time level recorded for Desktop Users?
EVJ.A: Desktop Users's lowest recorded level is approximately {44.93} minutes in {1961}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of New Users's Average Watch Time?
SC.A: The average value of New Users's average watch time is {95.04} minutes.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Mobile Users's Average Watch Time?
SC.A: The average value of Mobile Users's average watch time is {19.26} minutes.

SC.Q: What is the rate of change in New Users's Average Watch Time from the starting year to the final year?
SC.A: The rate of growth in New Users's average watch time is {0.14}%.

SC.Q: What is the rate of change in Desktop Users's Average Watch Time from the starting year to the final year?
SC.A: The rate of growth in Desktop Users's average watch time is {77.50}%.

NF.Q: Which years did Mobile Users's Average Watch Time exceed 19 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding values.
NF.A: {20.73} minutes in {1967} year, {19.01} minutes in {1963} year, {19.32} minutes in {1964} year.

NF.Q: Which years did New Users's Average Watch Time between 93 and 97 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding values.
NF.A: {95.25} minutes in {1966} year, {95.21} minutes in {1962} year.

NF.Q: In the year 1961, which lines had Average Watch Time below 27 minutes? Please list the lines and corresponding values.
In the year 1966, which lines had Average Watch Time below 36 minutes? Please list the lines and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1965, which line had the highest average Average Watch Time, Desktop Users, New Users, or Free Users?
NC.A: {New Users} had the highest average average watch time.

NC.Q: In 1966, which line had a higher Average Watch Time, {New Users} or {Desktop Users}?
NC.A: In 1966, {New Users} had a higher average watch time.

NC.Q: Was New Users's Average Watch Time in 1963 higher or lower than in 1966?
NC.A: The average watch time in 1963 was {higher} than in 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1965, which line experienced the largest change in Average Watch Time, Free Users, New Users, or Desktop Users?
NC.A: {Desktop Users} experienced the largest change in average watch time.

MSR.Q: Which label shows the largest fluctuation in the line chart?
MSR.A: The label with the largest fluctuation is {Desktop Users}.

MSR.Q: Which line shows the fastest average growth rate between 1966 and 1967?
MSR.A: {Desktop Users} has the fastest average growth rate between 1966 and 1967.

MSR.Q: Which label had the leading average watch time since 1963?
MSR.A: Since 1963, {New Users} had the leading average watch time.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the New Users. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(5 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1961, 1962, 1964, 1966, 1967}.
